messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Article Texas
messages.msgSnippet: Not sure where they got the idea that Tim Lambert is an unschooler! Actually, he is probably as much a proponent of school at home  as Gail Paquette (formerly
messages.messageBody:
Not sure where they got the idea that Tim Lambert is an unschooler!
Actually, he is probably as much a proponent of school at home as Gail
Paquette (formerly Gail Withrow). Message of the article is
good..............I just wanted to point out that Lambert a tad
misrepresented.



vicki



-----Original Message-----
From: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of greengolgi
Sent: Thursday, October 27, 2005 3:04 PM
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Article Texas



Check out this article in a Texas paper about a radically unschooling
family:

http://doiop.com/wildchild
